channel.title: The Unsolved Questions
channel.description:
-Delta Base, 317-
1. How do i make a message appear in chatbox after killing a monster? 2. How do i make an accumulator keep some arrows? (like when you shoot it, you have a 60% chance of keeping the arrow you shot? 3. How do i make an npc talk overhead? ~Thanks

item.title: The Unsolved Questions
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

lower the 5000 to like 20

Edit: now that i think about it, i dont think lowering the number will do anything. Sorry mate.

Read full topic

item.title: The Unsolved Questions
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

spon80:

[quote]How do i make an npc talk overhead?

i think this is it.

if (npcs[i].npcType == ID) { if (misc.random2(SECONDS) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "MESSAGE"; } }
NpcHander is where you put it in.[/quote]
NPCHandler.java:2923: not a statement
(misc.random2(5) <= 2) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2923: ‘;’ expected
(misc.random2(5) <= 2) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2927: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if
^
NPCHandler.java:3361: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:3361: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:3361: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:3375: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:3375: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:3375: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:3387: reached end of file while parsing
}→
^
10 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2009, 08:14:14 pm[/size][hr]actually narrowed it down to:

NPCHandler.java:2923: not a statement
(misc.random2(5000) <= 2);
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: The Unsolved Questions
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

How do i make an npc talk overhead?

i think this is it.

if (npcs[i].npcType == ID) { if (misc.random2(SECONDS) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "MESSAGE"; } }
NpcHander is where you put it in.

Read full topic
